Cato major, or, The book of old age first written by M.T. Cicero ; and now excellently Englished by William Austin of Lincolns Inne, Esquire ; with annotations upon the names of the men and places. Cato maior de senectute. English Cicero, Marcus Tullius. Austin, William, 1587-1634.
[10], 141, [2] p.
Printed for William Leake, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1648.
Translation of: Cato maior de senectute. Added illustrated t.p. engraved. First ed. of this translation. Cf. BM. Advertisements: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

[10], 141, [2] p.
Printed for William Leake, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1648.
